text: "Burning Love" is a 1972 song by Elvis Presley and was released as a single with the B-side It's a Matter of Time. It went to the top 10 in Australia, Canada, Ireland, New Zealand, South Africa, the United Kingdom and the United States. It has been used in various television programmes and movies since the 1980s. == References == Category:1972 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Elvis Presley songs Category:Melissa Etheridge songs Category:Wynonna Judd songs
title: Burning Love
